channel.title: 667 Matrix Disturbed Client Help
channel.description:
Hi,
My main problem is that i can't get my Jared/Signed webclient to connect to my source.I've changed everything in Loader.java,Client.java,gamestub.java to my Vps Ip.I've also followed ''Shabba 56'' Jaring tutorial carefully and accuratley but my client cannot connect to my source.I've jared it over 5 times now but it seems to not connect (by what i mean is that the client is saying "connecting to server 1%").
(Most of all i compiled the client over 5 times and the compiler of the client does work.)
Please Help Me ASAP.
Thank-You

item.title: 667 Matrix Disturbed Client Help

item.description:

Hi,

My main problem is that i can’t get my Jared/Signed webclient to connect to my source.I’ve changed everything in Loader.java,Client.java,gamestub.java to my Vps Ip.I’ve also followed ‘‘Shabba 56’’ Jaring tutorial carefully and accuratley but my client cannot connect to my source.I’ve jared it over 5 times now but it seems to not connect (by what i mean is that the client is saying “connecting to server 1%”).
